content.detailedDescription: I was taking pictures of the thunderbird airshow at mcchord afb. the black object to the right was not visible to the naked eye. i was viewing the airshow from washington hs in parkland wa. i noticed the object when reviewing the pictures.
content.summary: Black object appeared in picture taken of thunderbird airshow

content.detailedDescription:
I was 5

(1970) my parents were southwest baptist, didn't drink and we seldom had company. this night they were having a party. a hallway lead from the living room to the bedrooms and bath. mom and dads was the master bedroom at the end of the hall with it's own bath. mom wanted to put me in their bed so i would be farther away from the noise and be able to fall asleep. they were stringent about bed times. being five i had conquered the art of pretending to fall asleep."they were having a party!" i wanted to see what the grown ups did for fun. i couldn't wait to sneak down the hall and scramble behind the couch. 

when mom placed me in their bed the first thing i noticed was the bed was enormous, it was a queen and i slept in a twin. it was the size of a pasture. mom kissed me and tucked me in then left right away. i didn't even have time to pretend to fall asleep for her to leave. now i had to guess how long i needed to wait for them to forget about me and sneak my way down the hall to get a glimpse of all the action. she came right back, 'crap.'

that wasn't her? it was somebody else and it was wearing a hoodie? i actually wouldn't know what a hoodie was for a couple more years but anyway. when the figure stepped through the threshold of the door they raised their left hand. it wasn't a hoodie, it was the grim reaper. a five foot tall insect wearing a black hood and cape with a large head and long thin fingers. i shuffled backwards away from him up the bed to the pillows. he took two steps and was right next to me. his arms reached out in an insect way, wavering back forth. i pulled the sheets as hard as i could over my head. the fear was the most intense i've ever felt in my life. he touched my forehead. i know what i saw and i would be 15 before i convinced myself it wasn't real. i forgot everything after that till the next day. 35 years later i discovered the truth. i was blacked out and abducted by a large insect.

i had a photographic memory growing up.

(1973) my dad was going to sell the ranch and begin a career of costume harvesting. he was meeting his new partner in this venture whom had a son one year older than me. we'd been friends for that whole day and where playing outside as it began to get dark.

we we're playing chase in brads backyard when brad chased me up a cherry tree. my only route of escape was to climb. brad was on my heels when i stopped because of what i saw. a red orb was flying in the sky. it was as big as a house and was playing like a firefly in the sky. shortly we began to believe it was playing with us, it seemed to go where we wanted. it seemed to be a living entity. then suddenly it shot away towards the eastern horizon then back again. it left towards the north accelerating at a 45 degree angle at over 10,000 miles an hour or more.

that's when a giant roman candle appeared in the sky to our right, or south. a white ball of light bleeding red, blue and green, then another in line being just above it, then another. then we could see the tiny parachute that held the first one. then another to the north and then we could see the silhouette of a military aircraft. a c-130. then we both realized the last flare had gone off directly over my parents ranch.

we turned and bolted towards the house only to meet our dads coming out the front door. they didn't have time to talk to us because my dads horses had jumped then fence and were in the highway.
content.summary: Mantis abduction rising star tx

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my couch and i have some large picture windows up high. i was observing the clouds as i do sometimes. i will frequently see all the normal things like birds, planes, helicopters, insects, etc. when this object came into view i immediately knew it was not normal. it moved faster than a jet but slower than a meteor. it was a tan or dull copper color and was shaped like a tear drop. it passed through some clouds and above some others before moving out of sight. i would have taken a picture but there was no way to get it within a 10 second time frame so i just kept my eyes on it. it was moving in a straight path to the north and was northwest of my position. i don't know if it made a sound because i was inside watching tv on the couch. this happened at about 5:00 pm, sunday, august 29, 2016. it did not glow and was not "lit up". i've always wanted to see a ufo but this is not how i expected to see one. it was so very strange. it must have been pretty large based upon where it was flying in the tops of the clouds. i've seen large airliners in the same locations so this thing was easily as long as one but was like a narrow teardrop. it had no deviation in direction or change in speed. the "sharp" point of the teardrop tailed behind and the more rounded part was in front.
content.summary: I looked out my window and saw a fast moving odd shape. not a meteor or normal aircraft.

content.altitude: Landed, Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: This is 3rd attempt today to send pics and video with detailed report. as with previous attempts my normally operational iphone locks up when sending images of the orbs and i am of the belief the orbs are affecting the transmission. please if you receive this report call me immediately for further details and advice on what to do and for further investigation. i am being affected psychologically as these entities seem to be aware of my attempts to share imagery and info about their presence
content.distance: 20 Feet or Less, 21-100 Feet, 101-500 Feet, 501 Feet - 1 Mile
content.summary: Several orbs were observed at my home which have for 3 months repeatedly made themselves known and visible. pics and video were taken as done previously

content.detailedDescription: It was between 8-9 pm my children were in bed, so i know it was around that time. my fiance and i were outback in our screen room when i noticed the fireball. at first we thought it was a flare or chinese lantern but it never fizzled out and was moving very quickly from w to e. there was tail like a commet, as i was pointing this out we moved to our pool deck. that's when we witness the big black quite one with no sound or lights, it was moving very quickly and being as dark as it was i couldn't make out the shape. what's odd is right as i said that can't be a plane there are no lights one bluish white light blinked one time, then it appeared to rapidly accelerate and disappeared right after that we saw a helicopter and commercial airline, i remember saying the helicopter was loud had lights and was following the same route
content.summary: One fireball no tail no sound moved s to n mins later on black quiquino lights moved w to e one uish wbite like blinked once ironically after i made a comment about no lights too high and craft so dark to make out shape

content.detailedDescription:
My ex-girlfriend and i were traveling home to texas from denali national park in alaska.  we decided to stop by yellowstone national park on the way back to texas.  we were traveling south bound on highway 15 and were between wolf creek and helena, mt.  the time was between 21:00 to 22:00, but don’t know the exact time.  we were in between some mountains, when i saw a circular light rise up from the mountains to my left.  i lost sight of it because of the mountains, and i thought that was strange, and we traveled a bit more southward towards helena, mt and the city lights were in view now.  then i again saw the circular light moving westward slowly and always at the same altitude.  the light moved past the city slowly and initially i thought it was some kind of special helicopter or plane.  but then it accelerated very, very quickly, and made a loud whip crack like noise like a sonic boom, and some sort of smoke ring or vapor ring was formed were it had been.  the noise was very loud cause i heard it in my car several miles away traveling southbound on 15.  so finally, when it shot westward extremely fast,  it traveled for several miles, and the light then disappeared.  this was all at the same altitude.  

i waited to report this because i did not know who to report it to, and i also did not want to be labeled as making something up or fabricating a hoax.  i know what i saw and that is what i saw, and have no reason to lie.  i’m us army retired, and don’t want any kind of negative attention like that but i wanted to report this and maybe collaborate any other reports given for this date and time.  thanks again
content.summary: Circular light ascended from mountain, then traveled west, then accelerated, then disappeared

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Camping near grand bend. seen a brilliant white star-like object descend quickly with what looked like a controlled descent then completely disappear over the campsites. witnessed by one other person. approx 15 mins later my companion noticed two white-silver spheres floating across the sky at the same slow speed as if by invisible tether.... from one side of tree line to the other. kept a steady slow and straight course. no sounds. very strange. both objects appeared directly overhead.
content.summary: Star-like craft seen descending then disappearing over campsite. approx 15 mins later two white tethered spheres seen in sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was inside.I had my go pro outside filming the sky like any other night. i was using a night lapse. the object moved as fast as a shooting star. i didn't think anything different. until i pulled it up on a still frame. just happened to catch it still. blew my mind. i film every night. i have never seen anything like this. it moved light speed.
content.summary: I go pro the night sky every single night. nothing have i ever seen look like this. it was quiet. no sound. no lights. moved so fast only caught it using a night lapse. unexplainable.

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i spend most of our evenings on our apartment porch. we are on the corner of the 3rd story and face an open field next to our apartment complex. we're the only ones with this amount of an amazingly open field veiw at this complex. though it's an open field it is outlined with trees, some of which are close to our porch. from the porch of my 3rd story apt about 20-30ft out from me, just above a tree top, i looked up and out just in time to randomly see a dull orange/red orb come over and around a tree top right in front of me. i didn't sense it, it made no sound  at all, and even though it glowed orange and reddish orange it didn't cast enough light to shine on to anything. so with that being said if i hadn't just looked out at the view in front of me at that exact moment, i would have never seen it, i would have never known it was there at all. it moved fast and direct. staying just inches above the tree tops, moving decidedly around the tree tops. too fast, too silent and too weird of a light to be a drone, too close and too small to be mistaken for a plan or helicopter. a big storm was brewing in the next town over (broken arrow/tulsa) that we could easily see amazing lightening take place from, but the weather was very calm and pleasant where we were. almost no wind or noise, just a calm night. by the time i registered what i was seeing and started to say "wow look at..." to my husband, it was gone without a trace. the whole thing took place in under 10 seconds, my husband was lighting his cigarette while this was taken place and there for didn't see anything. it was the weirdest, yet curiously exciting moment ever. i've always believed with all my heart, no doubt about it, but had never seen with my own eyes. it's a 10 second moment i have played over and over and over again every single day since it happen. not a moment has gone by i don't think about it, not a night goes by i don't keep my eyes on the sky looking for... it or anything else like it. and the weirdset thing of all, it didn't fly away, shoot off or land. as soon as i made a sound to form the words wow, it was that exact moment, mid-flight past our porch it just fanished! gone. not up, not down, not hiding... light off in the blink of an eye, no traces left, gone. poof. and i've not been able to stop obsessing since. next day i had a strang, realistic dream during a midday nap. i felt the need to wake and check on my kids but when i tried to sit up and roll over i felt drugged, no strength, couldn't hardly move or open my eyes. i managed a weird flop and roll over, tried to say my daughters name but it sounded sluggish to my own ears. i managed to open my eyes just enough to be blinded by a very direct bright pin point of a light. i asked my husband later that day if he had come home from work on lunch and for some weird reason shined his phones flashlight in my face or something haha, but he said no definitely not. all i know is i must have immediately gone into a deep sleep and woke what felt like only 5 to 10 minutes later. everything was fine in the house. my daughter was asleep on the couch and my son was in his room on the xbox, everything seemed fine. then i noticed a wicked bad bruise on my left calf muscle with no explanation as to when or how i aquire it. a day or two later a solid white perfect circle appeared in the bruise, next day another perfect circle papered right next to the first, both in the middle of the bruise. that's also when i noticed there were sold pea diced hard lumps. one under each white circle in the bruise and the circles became outlined in perfect red lines that almost resemble spider veins but much softer, smaller and lighter. the bruises and red lines are gone now, but the hard mass is still very much there. also it stopped feeling like two individual pea sized knots, and started feeling more like the size and shape of a tylenol pill. as far as how all this makes me feel... mostly curious and ready. i feel ready, if that makes any sense? like something is about to happen that i want to happen and am relived? some fear of the unknown factors weasel in, but are far outweighed by excitement!
content.summary: Dull soft glowing orange/red orb between softball and watermelon sized seen about 20-30 feet away from me in tree tops.

content.detailedDescription:
Me and my family where driving home from a park called bayern park in germany ,my dad was driving the car,and i was sitting on the passenger
so i decided to take some pictures out of the window while window was completely open,and when i got home i looked at them on notist thease objects i was stunned when i foun them in my pictures they are 100% real 
i made them with my samsung galaxy note 4
i hope you guys can figure out what they are all those are taken on the same day,,hope you guys can figure out and analyze them,please massage me on my email adress if you guys figured out what those are
those pictures are zoomed on but nothing else.
the first 3 pictures are the same object captured on 3 difrent photos 
so this object must of had the same flight path as we drove,the 4th object looks like a cross flying straight up
and the 5th picture seems like a ufo cube iddent inside a bush with some kind of radiation coming out of it with a round widow shape in the front
content.summary: Cigar shape /cought on 3 different pictures /a cube landed hidden in a bush/and a cross shape ufo

content.detailedDescription:
Me encontraba observando con mi telescopio en las siguientes coordenada sobre las 22:30 tiempo oficial aproximadamente en las coordenadas 39âº 55' n    0âº 37' w en el municipio de viver a unos 700m de altura. la noche era clara en un 4 sobre 5 de seing por lo que la magnitud que se podia alcanzar visualmente de las estrellas a ojo desnudo rondaba la 6âª.
aparecio una luz muy brillante hacia el sur-sureste completamente estatica de color amarillo anaranjado con un fuerte destello vibratorio de intensidad variable pero leve. se mantuvo estã¡tica a una altura de unos 20âº por encima de mi horizonte que yo estimo que seria de otros 15 o 20 por lo que no alcanzaria una altitud de 45âº con toda seguridad. ni el tipo de luz ni la posiciã³n me confirmaban que fuera un avion o helicoptero. estuvo estatica un minuto o dos y comenzo a desplazarse hacia el oeste al principio lentamente y luego con mas velocidad disminuyendo su brillo hasta desaparecer. estimo que recorreria un cuarto de hora de arco hasta desaparecer.
ni que decirle que jamas habia observado semejante cosa, por supuesto no era un dron, he visto varios y era imposible que la distancia que se encontraba, que luego pude mas o menos determinar, pudiera emitir esa luz.
en pleno estado de estupefaccion y anotando los datos que le relato, habrian trascurrido unos 10 minutos del cese de la aparicion, volviã³ a aparecer de manera instantanea en el mismo lugar del horizonte y a la misma altura. no hubo ningãºn punto de luz que fuera incrementandose sino que fue un subito resplandor con la misma intensidad que la primera vez.
en esta segunda ocasion se mantuvo estatico unos pocos segundos, tal vez 30 o 40 y comenzã³ de nuevo a moverse hacia el oeste pero esta vez se fue trasladando a mucha mas distancia. observe claramente que se desplazaba con velocidad claramente no uniforme, intercalaba movimientos largos rapidos con otros cortos mas lentos y ello daba la sensacion de que era segmentado. al mismo tiempo variaba la intensidad de la luz llegando en un momento a incrementar tanto la misma que pense que pudiera dirigirse hacia mi posicion.
este segundo avistamiento duro unos tres o cuatro minutos y debido a los cambios de luminosidad constantes quede totalmente confundido en estimar la distancia a la que podria encontrarse ya que bien podia ser un objeto pequeã±o cercano o grande lejano.
mis dudas se aclararon un poco cuando comenzo a descender ya sobrepasada la posicion sur- suroeste y comprobe que quedaba ocultado tras la sierra. el perfil de la sierra siempre fue claramente observable pues al encontrase tras ella la ciudad de valencia su alumbrado nocturno hace que sea perfectamente distinguible al recortarse ante ella.
estimo por todo ello que debio ocultarse de mi vista a unos 10 o 12 km de mi posicion por las coordenadas 39âº 48' n.  0â° 38' w y que su aparicion fue en torno a 39â° 53'n  0â°35' w habiendo estado a una distancia de unos tres o cuatro km de mi posicion y a una altura estimada de unos 1000-1200 m sobre el nivel del mar y a unos 300-400 sobre el suelo.
para terminar solamente insistir en que no he encontrado explicacion alguna a este avistamiento y por ello se lo comunico.
content.summary: Luz anaranjada muy brillante.Estatica y con movimientos irregulares con dos apariciones sucesivas

content.detailedDescription: Faision un feu un carre noire est apparu il etait stationnaire a ensuite disparue dnas les nuages est ce un drone
content.summary: Carre noire stationnaire et qui monte ensuite ds les nuages est un drone

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home as i saw 3 big orange glowing lights over parkstein, i was more then 15 km away and it was so bright that you can see parts of the town. they were stationary hovering and didnt move, and they were in a triangle form, after i lost the visual contact because i drove down the hill it was gone, but later i heared from a friend he saw it until 11 pm.
content.summary: Glowing lights hovering

content.detailedDescription: we were all at a get to gether after a base ball game. the i noticed a star moving i said to all look at that. we all were looking the starwent to the left then to the right it moved fast then when it got to the center of our vision it split in two one went to the right the other to the left .  we don't know what it was it looked like a star.Or better yet it was the size of a star i don't have any evedence just what we all seen
content.summary: Observed star it moved to the left thento the right thenwent back to the middle of where ti started thensplit in two and zap one when to the left the other to the right like wow what in the hell can move that fast

content.detailedDescription: I was in a second story condo, looked out the kitchen window towards the undeveloped fields east of this new development, in the new eastern part of aurora, colorado. the newest development east. i saw the object which was ever changing shape and color, like it was alive, just hovering off of the ground. i turned away to tell my father to come and see this, then when i looked back it was gone! i know what i saw, it was a clear morning, and it was right there in the field. i believe it was definitely not of this world, and probably able to speed up the molecules of whatever kind of craft it was! so that i could not see it any longer. i ran outside and there was no sight of it anywhere. again, clear cool morning, no clouds noticed. i think i felt compelled to look out of the window, just a conclusion i have reached over time. it simply disappeared and i think it may have still been there, i was just unable to see it as it speeded up the molecules or something, so that i could no longer see it. i have always kept this in the back of my mind, and am convinced that there are probably an endless number of different life forms out there, many of which have visited our small bubble in space (earth)! peace
content.summary: It was changing shape and color, dark gray, silver, black, molecular continuously changing

content.detailedDescription: I can't that im english, because i can not speak very well
content.summary: I can't describe because my english is not the best

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting at the balcony of my room of the hotel and checked my photos of the day.
it was a strange noice like a infra-sound. suddenly two objects came from the sea level and went first into straight and than into not reproducible flight curves. i made a photo, pressed the camera against the balcony.
the objects left many dark "dust" (because the full moon was right of the objects it was partly covered with this black dust), it last hours for elimination of the black dust by the atmosphere.
the objects goes after some minutes into the sky as red stars . my camera was not working after the first photograph.The red stars was to be seen for minimum half an hour at the sky.At midnight the black dust vanished and the objects were not to be seen any more.
content.summary: Launching of 2 ships from the sea at menorca (baleares)

content.detailedDescription: After taking several pictures of the clouds and sunset in north scottsdale arizona in the moment of doing so i noticed a green unidentified object in one of the pictures i had taken at the top left corner. while taking the picture and focusing west on the sunset and clouds i thought there was something in the corner of my eye but i did not bother to look up or in the sky as i kept focused on the image i was taking. after taking the picture was what i noticed something strange was a part of the picture i had taken. it appeared in my pictureas a round green sphere like object that appeared to have some kind of light spikes all around it. unfortunately i had wished i had caught it with my naked eye at the time after i took the picture and noticed in the picture i looked up in the sky and there was nothing around. i thought it was pretty crazy and my first thought was that it was the light in my camera reflecting from the sun which made some sort of weird object there. until i googled the object and noticed right away that there were some images exactly like the one that i have in my picture that i had taken that day. i was the only one there taking the pictures arizona sunset.
content.summary: Green orb/sphere spotted in picture left top corner after taking pics of sunset in clouds

content.detailedDescription: Saw object out of back window. it was a very bright white light with green and red lights pulsating.I thought at first that it was an airplane, i pulled up and plane tracker on my phone to see if it were a commercial flight there were three flights near by at the time. one was on the other side of town and not in my field of view. the other was slightly off the coast in the direction of the object. i watched the tracker as it passed my line of sight and i was unable to find the plane. the third plane was farther off the coast and over the horizon. while i was looking for the planes the object i was seeing did not move. it stayed at the same position. not changing altitude at all. this object seemed to stay in the same place for a very long time approx two hours. at about 7am i went back to the window to check on the object the sun was rising and the object and greatly increased in altitude and was moving up and away to the sse. i estimate that the object was at an 70 degree angle while it was moving away. it was high and as the sun was coming up i vanished high in the sky. i was thinking it may have been a drone but when i last saw the object but it was really high in the sky. i tried to take some pictures but they did not turn out well. just a blurry white dot. i steadied the phone on the window to get a stable photo but the camera on the phone just wasn't sensitive enough to get a detailed photo. this was witnessed by me for about twenty minutes then i went to get my wife and we watched it together for awhile. we left the window to sit down and do some online searching for other possible explanations as to what we were seeing. we came back to the window at 7 am when the sun was coming up.
content.summary: Very bright light hovering for long time.

content.detailedDescription: In the parking lot of  walmart 875  palm bay  rd happened to  glance  up at the evening  sky  and  noticed an object  what  first  appeared to  be the  only  star in the  sky but at  closer  look  appeared to be  2  stars  one  under the other or  possibly  light  emitting  downward from the  first  object ,the  object  appeared  stationary  , i  stopped a  fellow  patron  walking by and the 2 of  us  sat  for  30  minutes  watching  this  thing  trying to  reason  what  it might be after 30  minutes  as the  sun was  almost  gone  the  object  appear  to  go  below the  horizon ,i assume it was  stationary  and  what  we were seeing  was the  earth  turning it out of our view. this was clearly  not  normal aircraft , we also both  seemed to see   little  sparks of  light emitting irregularly from the  bottom  object/beam
content.summary: Double  star like object  appeared  stationary  in  sky  for  over  30  min

content.detailedDescription:
I was out walking my dog on the sidewalk in front of my house in burlington, vermont. i've seen lots of unexplained things in the sky, so for many years, whenever i'm outside, i observe the sky. what i saw tonight starting about 10:20 was a large orange sphere of light, maybe 100 feet above the trees, approximately a couple of blocks away when i first saw it through the trees. i moved to a place with no trees to block it; from then on i could see it clearly. it made no sound. it was traveling slowly south, towards me, in a straight line, not blinking or undulating or anything. i watched it for approximately 4-5 minutes (no watch or camera--sigh). when it was almost overhead, it suddenly made a right-angle turn to my left and then faded out to nothing. i stayed outside for another 20 minutes, but i didn't see it again.  as soon as i came back into the house, i wrote down all the details i could remember. then i started filling out this form.

i was very excited while watching it. about 2 minutes after i sighted it, a young man across the street came out of his apartment, so i hollered to him to look. he saw it for sure, but didn't seem very excited. he tried to explain it as a satellite with the sun (far below the horizon by 10:20 in august)shining on it. i've seen many satellites. they don't look anything like what i was seeing. they're star-sized and far away, like stars. and they look white. this orange sphere was about 2/3 the size a full moon is when it's all the way up in the sky.

i knew i was looking at a ufo because i've read a lot about them and have personally witnessed 5, counting this one. my sister and parents have also witnessed ufos. the ones i saw were all different from one another--except the first one, in 1956, which was quite similar to the one i saw tonight. at around midnight, my boyfriend and i were driving down a woods road with a river to the right of it. we saw an orange sphere of light moving slowly towards the road from the left. it made no sound. it stopped and hovered over the wires right in front of us. we got out of the car to see it, but it zoomed off the way it came, fast. i wrote that incident up in mufon years ago.
content.summary: Orange, close, slowly coming toward me until turned/faded; starry night; from my viewpoint, about 2/3 size of full moon high in sky but low

content.detailedDescription: Father called on my phone to alert me to the first object which was about 250 degrees sw and two finger widths above the tree line. pulsating through white, blue, yellow, red, orange, green, purple(very bright), then blue very quickly. a finger width to the left another starlike object with the same color pattern but pulsating at less than half the speed. looked to the nw at 306 degrees and saw another with the same color pattern but vibrating. another starlike object would separate to the left of it then move back into the original object. the first two objects moved quickly behind the trees(5 mins or less) but the last object that separated stayed above the trees but faded away. checked with an astronomy app on my phone before they disappeared to make sure i wasn't seeing stars or supernovas blinking out but nothing showed up in the areas these were, except for the tail of ursa major which was easily seen by me.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Three star like ufos. two a finger width apart, pulsating at different speeds but same color pattern. third starlike further north, vibrating changing from one to two and back again.

content.detailedDescription: I was at home. heard thunder and checked radar on line. storms in area, north west. went upstairs to see if there was lighting, i love storms. looked north west, and saw the towering clouds as the lighting lit them up. i saw a red light, and figured it was a plane, cause o'hare air port is close, but the red light had a different type of light. not a strobe, but faded in and out, but never going all the way out. and it seemed like it was a different type of light. almost more intense and direct. but after the one light, i saw another, then two more, then i saw a helicopter coming from the south heading north to the storm, all while these objects are appearing in the sky, just south of the storm that i had been watching. after the helicopter had gone by, i realized that there were more appearing and seemed like they were coming out of the storm way west of me,(moving south out of the storm), coming east and then moving north west again into the storm. i counted ten of these objects, not moving like the helicopter that flew by earlier. they were appearing in and out of the storm, not moving super fast right angles, but more abruptly than anything i've seen watching the skies close to o'hare air port. some times there were two together, but they were definitely following the same path. i do believe in life outside of our own planet, and thought i'd seen some weird stuff in the sky. but i truly believe that what i saw was not of this earth. i sent some family members a frantic, but excited number of texts, just because i had to tell someone. this is the most excited i have ever been about this subject, i feel like we are on the cusp of something great and possibly historic. i think something is getting ready to happen. good or bad...I am very happy to have witnessed what i have seen tonight, august 27th 2016. objects seen at on or around 9:30pm central time. no drinking or any other use of anything was going on during the event, but after what i saw, i cracked a beer, and after i finish this, i am going to drink a couple beers and stare at the north west sky, and hope for the best. i am not usually a very upbeat kind of person, but for some reason i feel like a million bucks since i saw what i have seen tonight. never really thought that i'd be doing something like this, but here it is...And it's the truth. thank you.
content.summary: Nw storm. ufos from west to nw into storm. helicopter present. awsome!

content.detailedDescription: It was about 11 30 when i went outside to smoke and i was looking up at the stars when i saw a light moving slowly across the sky, passing by stars in a straight line. i figured it was a satellite so i watched it for about 3 mins before it shot off like a shooting star in a completely different direction than it was moving before. it was awsome! that's why i look at stars at night!!!
content.summary: Saw what seemed to be a satellite moving slowly across sky, then took off like a shooting star in a different direction

content.detailedDescription:
My boyfriend and i were driving m37 to ludigton on 08-20-2016. around 10:25 that evening we were about 20 minutes past mesick. we saw 3 insanely bright and wide vertical light beams just appear  on the horizon in front of us. as if they all turned on at once. they looked like spotlights, but we couldn't find where they were coming from on the ground. we looked all around us for any kind of building/ airport/ etc. and nothing around us would have had spotlights. we were too far from any big cities or structures. we were essentially in the middle of the mnf. about ten minutes later we ended up passing them, the beams to our left, or so we thought. another ten minutes or so had passed and we came over a hill and saw five more beams just like it. it was almost like we were in a dome, and the lights were against the far side of the dome (that we were facing) and traveling up the side so they were also over us. they started blinking in line, starting on the left, and then we passed them for sure, and they were gone. no one behind us stopped, and neither did we. we both tried to take photos and videos of it, but although it lit up he sky, our phone screens showed nothing but blackness. but we were in the manistee national forest, there was nothing around that would emit that kind of light. it was pretty cloudy and dark that night, and the beams of light lit up the entire sky like it was daylight. they didn't seem to imprint on the clouds at all, like a spotlight would. and they had to have been twice as wide and so much brighter than any spotlight i've ever seen.  no idea what it could have been. thoroughly freaked me out, and i truly don't scare easily. it just didn't seem normal. if a civilian had lights that big and bright i would assume it to be illegal. i've seen plenty of ghosts in my life and had other alien-y experiences, but this one really hit me. i absolutely have no idea what it was. 

the first three beams looked like this coming off of the earth: \ | /
the second five looked like: \ \ | / /

like i said, the second five blinked in order starting on the leftmost beam. 
they seemed to actually disappear as we passed them, as we could no longer see them behind us. 

i wonder if the other drivers behind us could see them or if it was just us. 
we plan on returning to investigate more.
content.summary: Beams of light similar to spotlights, bigger, brighter, not spotlights. 3, then 5. appeared, disappeared, reappeared, blinked, disappeared

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my front porch at approximately 8:50pm, when i happened to look over my neighbor's house.  i saw a single red/orange lights that appeared to be hovering behind the trees. it then moved from east to south east.  about one minute later, a group of three of the same lights appeared and traveled in the same direction.  this group was followed by a group of four lights.  two of the lights in this group of four got extremely bright for about 5 seconds and then dimmed again.  this group was followed by a group of three and then a pair.  all of the lights traveled in the same direction.  some of them changed their altitude multiple times.  i would estimate the lights were no more than 500 feet above the ground.  they were no more than one mile from me.  i lost sight of all the lights as they moved away and behind houses and trees.  we are in the flight path of an air force base, and we see all types of aircraft.  these lights were not blinking, which makes me think they were not anticollision lights on a plane or helicopter.  i did not hear any sounds coming from the lights.  they were so close, that if they were an aircraft of some type, i would have been able to hear them. while i was watchin the lights, i observed a small private plane, traveling towards the air base, fly between two of the lights.  the lights or gifted from the direction of the air base, butappeared to be at much too low of an altitude to have come from there.  they literally popped up from behind a group of trees and houses.  i have seen the same lights several times, but only in groups of two or three.
content.summary: 16 red/orange solid lights observed. no sound.

content.detailedDescription: I was standing on my back deck, looking at stars. 3 lights in a triangular shape caught my eye. it was slowly moving to the left. at this point a friend who was with me saw it as well. i thought it may have been a plane. then it stopped and hung in mid air. a second later it began to slowly move upward in a rapid zigzag pattern. it stopped again, before shooting off towards the right. it was then that both me and my friend lost sight of it. each light was about a thumb length apart. earlier in the month a saw a similar ufo, also while stargazing. this one appeared much larger, about twice as large. it was to the west however, and was only visible for two seconds. no one else with me saw the first one, and i dismissed until a month later when me and a friend saw this newer one. it in itself did nothing to me psychologically, however the experience had a profound impact on me, and ever since i have seen life differently in some ways.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Looked up and saw 3 triangular lights. moved to left, stopped, moved back and forth, flew off to the right very quickly

content.detailedDescription: Lying in hammock at 6:25pm. strange looking objet flying from southwest to southeast in bright sunshine. many jets fly over my house from the east & the west on the way to sea-tac. i immediately knew this was not plane. it was a gold triangle with a black horizontal trailing edge. it was hollow in the center & had 6 pointy shafts on the leading edge. this thing flew upright in a straight sideways line then everything few seconds it would spin. it was brilliant gold color. the only other colors was the black horizontal trailing edge. the craft had detailed shape. i was able to watch with binoculars for 15 seconds until i lost it behind the trees. i was in awe. this was my first sighting, & it was mind blowing. it was a beautiful object.
content.summary: Easterly gold triangle. hallow center. black trailing edge. objective would spin then fly straight. pointy shafts on leading edge. 15 clear seconds w/binoculars.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Sitting in backyard. happened to look straight up during dinner and saw two very small bright objects, almost like stars, hovering very high up in the sky. they moved very slowly, almost like they were circling each other. then one began to move south until it was out of view. the other stayed behind a wisp of cloud before it too moved off. both disappeared behind neighboring house. did not appear to be plane, helicopter, star, or drone. possibly a weather balloon, but i've never seen one before. felt very weird to watch them, as they looked like stars but there were no other stars in the area (the sun hadn't gone down yet), and they definitely were moving.
content.summary: Saw two small bright objects hovering very high then moving off

content.detailedDescription: Big black object in the sky.  i was in the the heide park soltau with my girlfriend and the we see the object.
content.summary: Big black object in the sky
